item.title: Lessons for small and medium-sized enterprises from successful viral campaigns
item.description: 4imprint, a company that sells promotional products, has created a new infographic called “Going Viral.” This infographic explains how small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) can learn from viral marketing campaigns. One suggestion is to connect a campaign with something already trending, like a popular TV show or book. This can effectively help a marketing effort gain traction with a specific audience. The infographic also encourages businesses to consider product trials and giveaways.

item.title: Blue paper designed to assist small and medium-sized enterprises in developing effective Pinterest strategies
item.description: 4imprint, a company selling promotional products, has published a guide to help small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) utilize Pinterest for business growth. This guide showcases the success stories of established brands on Pinterest and explores its role in a comprehensive marketing strategy. [Image] Source: Pinterest. The guide emphasizes the platform’s visual nature, making it especially well-suited for industries like food, interior design, and fashion. With a user base of 70 million, “Grow your Business with Pinterest” suggests significant potential for businesses.
